parameters.name: $source_query$
parameters.label: DBConnection_SRC
parameters.customQuery:
SELECT 
  DISTINCT 
  prkr.policy_system_id, 
  prkr.policy_number, 
  prkr.policy_module_number, 
  prkr.policy_key,
  prkr.policy_key_code,
  prkr.risk_system_id, 
  prkr.risk_id, 
  b.systemid AS building_system_id, 
  b.id AS building_id, 
  LPAD(b.bldgnumber, 3, '0') AS building_number, 
  c.systemid AS coverage_system_id, 
  c.id as coverage_id,
  c.cmmcontainer AS coverage_cmm_container, 
  c.status AS coverage_status, 
  c.coveragecd as coverage_code,
  c.description AS coverage_description,
  c.finalpremiumamt AS coverage_premium_amount, 
  l.systemid AS limit_system_id, 
  l.parentid AS limit_parent_id, 
  l.coverage_limit1 AS limit_coverage_limit1, 
  l.coverage_limit2 AS limit_coverage_limit2,  
  l.coverage_limit3 AS limit_coverage_limit3, 
  l.coverage_limit4 AS limit_coverage_limit4,
  tgt.uw_dashboard_coverage_details_row_id,
  tgt.uw_dashboard_coverage_details_md5_hash_value
  FROM 
  dbo.coverage_stg c 
  LEFT JOIN dbo.building_stg b ON c.systemid = b.systemid 
  AND c.cmmcontainer = b.cmmcontainer AND c.cmmcontainer = 'Policy' -- filtering ON Policy only
  AND c.parentid = b.parentid
  LEFT JOIN dbo.basicpolicy_stg bp on
    bp.systemid = c.systemid
    AND bp.cmmcontainer = c.cmmcontainer
  LEFT JOIN dbo.policy_risk_key_reference prkr ON 
  c.systemid = prkr.policy_system_id 
  AND c.cmmcontainer = prkr.policy_cmm_container 
  AND prkr.risk_id = b.parentid
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
      DISTINCT systemid, 
      parentid, 
      cmmcontainer, 
      MAX(
        CASE WHEN limitcd = 'Limit1' THEN value END
      ) AS "coverage_limit1", 
      MAX(
        CASE WHEN limitcd = 'Limit2' THEN value END
      ) AS "coverage_limit2", 
      MAX(
        CASE WHEN limitcd = 'Limit3' THEN value END
      ) AS "coverage_limit3", 
      MAX(
        CASE WHEN limitcd = 'Limit4' THEN value END
      ) AS "coverage_limit4" 
    FROM 
      dbo.limit_stg 
    GROUP BY 
      systemid, 
      parentid, 
      cmmcontainer
  ) l ON c.systemid = l.systemid 
  AND c.id = l.parentid 
  left join dbo.uw_dashboard_coverage_details tgt
  on tgt.risk_id = prkr.risk_id
  and tgt.coverage_system_id = c.systemid
  and tgt.coverage_id = c.id
  and tgt.coverage_cmm_container = c.cmmcontainer
  and tgt.coverage_description = c.description
  and tgt.uw_dashboard_coverage_details_row_effective_end_date = '9999-12-31'
WHERE c.status = 'Active' 
  AND prkr.policy_risk_key_reference_row_effective_end_date = '9999-12-31' 
UNION
SELECT
  DISTINCT 
  prkr.policy_system_id, 
  prkr.policy_number, 
  prkr.policy_module_number, 
  prkr.policy_key,
  prkr.policy_key_code,
  prkr.risk_system_id, 
  prkr.risk_id, 
  b.building_application_system_id AS building_system_id, 
  b.building_application_id AS building_id, 
  LPAD(
    b.building_application_building_number, 
    3, '0'
  ) AS building_number, 
  c.coverage_application_system_id AS coverage_system_id, 
  c.coverage_application_id as coverage_id,
  c.coverage_application_cmm_container AS coverage_cmm_container, 
  c.coverage_application_status AS coverage_status, 
  c.coverage_application_coverage_code as coverage_code,
  c.coverage_application_description AS coverage_description,
  c.coverage_application_final_premium_amount AS coverage_premium_amount, 
  l.systemid AS limit_system_id, 
  l.parentid AS limit_parent_id, 
  l.coverage_limit1 AS limit_coverage_limit1, 
  l.coverage_limit2 AS limit_coverage_limit2,  
  l.coverage_limit3 AS limit_coverage_limit3, 
  l.coverage_limit4 AS limit_coverage_limit4,
  tgt.uw_dashboard_coverage_details_row_id,
  tgt.uw_dashboard_coverage_details_md5_hash_value
  FROM dbo.coverage_application_stg c 
  LEFT JOIN dbo.building_application_stg b ON c.coverage_application_system_id = b.building_application_system_id 
  AND c.coverage_application_cmm_container = b.building_application_cmm_container 
  and c.coverage_application_parent_id = b.building_application_parent_id
  LEFT JOIN dbo.policy_risk_key_reference prkr ON c.coverage_application_system_id = prkr.policy_system_id 
  AND c.coverage_application_cmm_container = prkr.policy_cmm_container AND prkr.policy_cmm_container = 'Application' -- filtering ON Application only
  AND prkr.risk_id = b.building_application_parent_id 
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
      DISTINCT systemid, 
      parentid, 
      cmmcontainer, 
      MAX(
        CASE WHEN limitcd = 'Limit1' THEN value END
      ) AS "coverage_limit1", 
      MAX(
        CASE WHEN limitcd = 'Limit2' THEN value END
      ) AS "coverage_limit2", 
      MAX(
        CASE WHEN limitcd = 'Limit3' THEN value END
      ) AS "coverage_limit3", 
      MAX(
        CASE WHEN limitcd = 'Limit4' THEN value END
      ) AS "coverage_limit4" 
    FROM 
      dbo.limit_stg 
    GROUP BY 
      systemid, 
      parentid, 
      cmmcontainer
  ) l ON c.coverage_application_system_id = l.systemid 
  AND c.coverage_application_id = l.parentid 
  left join dbo.uw_dashboard_coverage_details tgt
  on tgt.risk_id = prkr.risk_id
  and tgt.coverage_system_id = c.coverage_application_system_id
  and tgt.coverage_id = c.coverage_application_id
  and tgt.coverage_cmm_container = c.coverage_application_cmm_container
  and tgt.coverage_description = c.coverage_application_description
  and tgt.uw_dashboard_coverage_details_row_effective_end_date = '9999-12-31'
  WHERE c.coverage_application_status = 'Active' 
  AND prkr.policy_risk_key_reference_row_effective_end_date = '9999-12-31'
